@Test public void testAdviceWithPolicy() throws Exception {     RouteDefinition route = context.getRouteDefinitions().get(0).     RouteReifier.adviceWith(route, context, new AdviceWithRouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             weaveById("b").after().to("mock:result").         }     }).     context.start().     getMockEndpoint("mock:a").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:b").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").policy(new MyPolicy()).to("mock:a").id("a").to("mock:b").id("b"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").policy(new MyPolicy()).to("mock:a").id("a").to("mock:b").id("b").         }     }. }
@Override public void beforeWrap(RouteContext routeContext, NamedNode definition) { // noop }
@Override public Processor wrap(RouteContext routeContext, Processor processor) {     return processor. }
